newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Hagemeyer in IT-merger with Computerij.
newsitem.headline: Hagemeyer in IT-merger with Computerij.

text.p: Trading company Hagemeyer NV said on Monday it was merging its information technology activities in the Netherlands and Belgium with those of the Dutch Computerij Group based in Zwolle.

"The parties have agreed that Hagemeyer will have a 51 percent share in the combination, whilst 49 percent will be retained by the present shareholders and the management of Computerij Group," Hagemeyer said.
The merger is expected to have a positive impact on Hagemeyer's earnings per share, but it added that the effect on 1997 earnings will be modest.

The merger creates one of the larger operations in the Benelux market for personal computers, networks and related software, with combines sales volume of NLG 800 million and 600 employees. -- Amsterdam newsroom +31 20 504 5000
